lead_paragraph: Italy’s captain, Fabio Cannavaro, will miss the European Championships after tearing ligaments in his right ankle on Monday during the Azzurri’s first training session in Enzersdorf, Austria. Italy replaced Cannavaro with Fiorentina defender Alessandro Gamberini; goalkeeper Gianluigi Buffon will most likely become captain. Italy opens next Monday against the Netherlands.
